parks.name: David T. Kennedy Park
parks.address: 2200 S. Bayshore Drive Coconut Grove, FL 33133

reviews.name: Kennedy
reviews.detail: This park has a beautiful fountain in the front and automatic doors. The lobby is spacious with a smooth floor. The lobby washroom area has a gender neutral accessible separate washroom, which has buttons to open the door AND a button to lock it from inside, which I have never seen before. The main washroom also has a huge accessible stall that is actually its own room with a door as well.
